dcterms:description: A differentiable simulator used to replicate the beam physics process in Mu2e experiments, generating spill intensity and associated data for training reinforcement learning models.
dcterms:title: Mu2e Simulator

dcterms:description: The Mu2e experiment aims to search for new physics by studying the decay of muons into electrons, requiring a highly uniform extracted beam intensity during proton spills.
dcterms:title: Mu2e Experiment

dcterms:creator: M. Thieme
dcterms:description: A presentation discussing the application of machine learning techniques for slow spill regulation in the Fermilab delivery ring.
dcterms:title: Spill Regulation System (SRS)
